TopicTitle: Random poll, do you sit or stand when you wipe?

Articles.Content:
I've asked my friends this and most of them stand, for whatever reason...

It seems like it's about half and half, but I'm curious to see what you guys say.

Personally, I sit, like any normal person.

If you have anything to debate about it, feel free to say it. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Vote here:

[http://strawpoll.me/4866246](http://strawpoll.me/4866246)

If it's close to 50/50, then both are "normal."

Why can't you put a poll in the thread?
